languages.text: "Как же без волков, если разговор про Фенрис. Волки страшны. Но самые страшные волки Фенриса — это мы".
"One cannot speak of Fenris without mentioning its wolves. Wolves are fearsome. But there are no more fearsome wolves than us."
languages.original_text: "Как же без волков, если разговор про Фенрис. Волки страшны. Но самые страшные волки Фенриса — это мы".

traits.locale_text: "One cannot speak of Fenris without mentioning its wolves. Wolves are fearsome. But the most fearsome wolves on Fenris are us."
"One cannot speak of Fenris without mentioning its wolves. Wolves are fearsome. But the most fearsome wolves on Fenris are us."
"One cannot speak of Fenris without mentioning its wolves. Wolves are fearsome. But the most fearsome wolves on Fenris are us."
"One cannot speak of Fenris without mentioning its wolves. Wolves are fearsome. But there are no more fearsome wolves than us."

languages.text: “提到芬里斯，就不能不提它的狼群。狼群确实可怕，但我们才是整个芬里斯最可怕的狼群。”
languages.original_text: "One cannot speak of Fenris without mentioning its wolves. Wolves are fearsome. But there are no more fearsome wolves than us."

traits.locale_text: “提到芬里斯，就不能不提它的狼群。狼群确实可怕，但我们才是整个芬里斯最可怕的狼群。”

languages.text: «No se puede hablar de Fenris sin mencionar sus lobos. Y son temibles. Pero los lobos más temibles somos nosotros».
languages.original_text: "One cannot speak of Fenris without mentioning its wolves. Wolves are fearsome. But there are no more fearsome wolves than us."

traits.locale_text: «No se puede hablar de Fenris sin mencionar sus lobos. Y son temibles. Pero los lobos más temibles de Fenris somos nosotros».

languages.text: 「狼を抜きにしてフェンリスは語れない。狼は恐ろしい。だが、その中で最も恐ろしい狼は俺達だ」
languages.original_text: "One cannot speak of Fenris without mentioning its wolves. Wolves are fearsome. But there are no more fearsome wolves than us."

traits.locale_text: 「狼を抜きにしてフェンリスを語ることはできない。狼は恐ろしい。だが、フェンリスで最も恐ろしい狼は我々だ」

languages.text: "Man kann nicht von Fenris sprechen, ohne seine Wölfe zu erwähnen. Wölfe sind furchterregend. Aber es gibt keine furchterregenderen Wölfe als uns."
languages.original_text: "One cannot speak of Fenris without mentioning its wolves. Wolves are fearsome. But there are no more fearsome wolves than us."

traits.locale_text: "Man kann nicht von Fenris sprechen, ohne seine Wölfe zu erwähnen. Wölfe sind furchterregend. Aber die furchterregendsten Wölfe auf Fenris sind wir."

languages.text: « On ne saurait parler de Fenris sans mentionner ses loups. Si tous les loups sont effrayants, nous sommes de loin les plus redoutables de tous. »
languages.original_text: "One cannot speak of Fenris without mentioning its wolves. Wolves are fearsome. But there are no more fearsome wolves than us."

traits.locale_text: « On ne saurait parler de Fenris sans mentionner ses loups. Les loups sont effrayants. Mais les loups les plus effrayants de Fenris, c'est nous. »

languages.original_text: "One cannot speak of Fenris without mentioning its wolves. Wolves are fearsome. But there are no more fearsome wolves than us."

languages.text: "Kurtları anmadan Fenris'ten söz etmek imkânsızdır. Kurtlar korkunçtur. Fakat bizden daha korkunç kurt yoktur."
languages.original_text: "One cannot speak of Fenris without mentioning its wolves. Wolves are fearsome. But there are no more fearsome wolves than us."

traits.locale_text: "Kurtları anmadan Fenris'ten söz etmek imkânsızdır. Kurtlar korkunçtur. Fakat bizden daha korkunç kurt yoktur."
